title: Speedy Stitcher Sewing Awl, One Color, One Size (SEW120), RED
description: Includes Speedy Stitcher Sewing Awl, 2 needles - 1 straight and 1 curved, a bobbin wound with 14-yards of waxed thread, and instruction guide. Ideal for sewing any heavy material including: awnings, tents, upholstery, shoes, belts, sporting equipment, sails and mooring, auto tops, saddles and harnesses, handbags, and more. Boxed.
